summary: This memo discusses Laureano Batista's alleged connection to Rudolph Richard Davis, including providing men for a lumber business and his prior CIA operational approval as a PP agent in Havana, Cuba. It also mentions Batista's role in the Movimiento Democratica Cristiano (MDC) and their offer to assist the Hungarian Freedom Fighters Federation.
title: BATISTA, Laureano
sender: Secretary for Military Affairs, Executive Committee, Movimiento Democrats Cristiano
